item.title: March 3, 1993
item.description: 3-3-93 That’s a lot of threes, wouldn’t you say. Not more than three weeks ago, I told myself, “Kurt, things are going to change. You are going to start being a doer, and not just a dreamer.” Everybody dreams, but few do. It feels funky, wrong, bad being a secretary with fervent military interests. Sitting on one’s ass all day sap’s the mollasses right out of you. A good day needs to be balanced between mental & physical / subjective & objective activities.
